QuestData.Title: Prime Slime
QuestData.Description: I've become very interested in the slimes inhabiting Skulk Rock. No matter how many times they're cleared out, they seem to return, yet it doesn't seem they're capable of reproducing from a single slime.$B$BI think something's growing in there. There's a source where all the slimes come from, and I want to study it. Find this source, and bring me back a sample.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Try not to get too close... Who knows what this thing is capable of?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Direglob Sample from The Direglob.
QuestData.RewardText: Fascinating... How large did you say it was? I wonder if others could be found intact...$B$BThis sample is excellent. I'll be sharing it with my fellow researchers.
